name: DBots - Best Discord Bots
description: Deploy the best Discord bot list, in a few steps.

API_URL.description: Same as DASHBOARD_URL, but with /api/v1 at the end.

BOT_ROLE_ID.description: ID of the bot role, given to bots that join the guild.

DEV_ROLE_ID.description: ID of the developer role, in the bot list guild.

GUILD_ID.description: ID of the guild for the bot list.

LOG_CHANNEL_ID.description: ID of the log channel, in the bot list guild.

MONGO_URI.description: The MongoDB URI to your database [i.e. from MongoDB Atlas].
